academyAwards.title: American Beauty
academyAwards.actors: Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Wes Bentley
academyAwards.description: While struggling to endure his tightly wound wife, an unfulfilling job and a surly teen, a man becomes obsessed with one of his daughter's friends.

academyAwards.title: Jurassic Park
academyAwards.actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
academyAwards.category:
Action & Adventure
                  Classic Movies
                  Sci-Fi & Fantasy
academyAwards.description: A multimillionaire unveils a theme park where visitors can see live dinosaurs, but an employee tampers with the security system and the dinos escape.

academyAwards.title: A Beautiful Mind
academyAwards.actors: Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly, Christopher Plummer
academyAwards.description: This Oscar-winning drama charts the life and work of famed economist John Forbes Nash Jr., a brilliant man plagued by the anguish of mental illness.

academyAwards.title: The Imitation Game
academyAwards.actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Rory Kinnear
academyAwards.description: During World War II, a mathematician leads a team of cryptanalysts as they work feverishly to break the Germans' notorious Enigma code.

academyAwards.title: The Social Network
academyAwards.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake, Armie Hammer
academyAwards.description: Director David Fincher's biographical drama chronicles the meteoric rise of Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg from Harvard sophomore to Internet superstar.

academyAwards.title: Silver Linings Playbook
academyAwards.actors: Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver
academyAwards.description: After a stint in a mental hospital, Pat moves in with his parents and tries to win back his wife, until he meets a woman who's as unstable as he is.

academyAwards.title: Jaws
academyAwards.actors: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss, Lorraine Gary
academyAwards.description: When an insatiable great white shark terrorizes Amity Island, a police chief, an oceanographer and a grizzled shark hunter seek to destroy the beast.

academyAwards.title: The Hateful Eight
academyAwards.actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins
academyAwards.description: Years after the Civil War, a bounty hunter and his captive are waylaid by a Wyoming blizzard and hole up in a way station with six dicey strangers.

academyAwards.title: Rocky
academyAwards.actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
academyAwards.description: Sylvester Stallone shot to fame as Rocky Balboa, an unknown fighter who's given a shot at fighting world champ Apollo Creed as a publicity stunt.

academyAwards.title: L.A. Confidential
academyAwards.actors: Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, James Cromwell
academyAwards.description: Three wildly different cops form an uneasy alliance to ferret out police corruption in this Oscar-winning whodunit set in 1950s Los Angeles.

academyAwards.title: Mystic River
academyAwards.actors: Sean Penn, Tim Robbins, Kevin Bacon, Laurence Fishburne
academyAwards.description: Tragedy reunites childhood friends Sean, Dave and Jimmy when they're linked together in a murder investigation about Jimmy's teenage daughter.

academyAwards.title: King Kong
academyAwards.actors: Kyle Chandler, Jamie Bell, Naomi Watts, John Sumner
academyAwards.category:
Action & Adventure
                  International Movies
                  Sci-Fi & Fantasy
academyAwards.description: Peter Jackson's remake of the classic follows a group of adventurous explorers and filmmakers to Skull Island, where they search for a giant gorilla.

academyAwards.title: Time
academyAwards.actors: Yin Tse, Bo-Bo Fung, Suet Lam
academyAwards.description: A retired assassin and his old partners find renewed purpose by helping fellow seniors end their lives -- until a young woman requests their services.

academyAwards.title: Black Hawk Down
academyAwards.actors: Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore, Eric Bana
academyAwards.description: When U.S. forces attempt to capture two underlings of a Somali warlord, their helicopters are shot down and the Americans suffer heavy casualties.

academyAwards.title: The Fighter
academyAwards.actors: Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Melissa Leo
academyAwards.description: After a string of defeats, a boxer rediscovers his fighting will with help from his trainer and half-brother, a once-talented pugilist.

academyAwards.title: Marriage Story
academyAwards.actors: Scarlett Johansson, Adam Driver, Laura Dern, Alan Alda
academyAwards.description: Academy Award-nominated filmmaker Noah Baumbach directs this incisive and compassionate look at a marriage coming apart and a family staying together.

academyAwards.title: 8 Mile
academyAwards.actors: Eminem, Kim Basinger, Mekhi Phifer, Brittany Murphy
academyAwards.description: Aspiring hip-hop artist Jimmy views his home, Detroit's 8 Mile district, as a psychological line that separates him from where and who he wants to be.

academyAwards.title: Apollo 13
academyAwards.actors: Tom Hanks, Kevin Bacon, Bill Paxton, Gary Sinise
academyAwards.description: Technical troubles scuttle the Apollo 13 mission in 1970, risking the lives of astronaut Jim Lovell and his crew in this chronicle of a true story.

goldenGlobe.description: After a string of defeats, a boxer rediscovers his fighting will with help from his trainer and half-brother, a once-talented pugilist.

goldenGlobe.title: Steel Magnolias
goldenGlobe.actors: Sally Field, Dolly Parton, Shirley MacLaine, Daryl Hannah
goldenGlobe.description: In this bittersweet drama, a close-knit group of women congregates at a beauty parlor in a small Louisiana town to laugh, cry and discuss life events.

goldenGlobe.title: Burlesque
goldenGlobe.actors: Cher, Christina Aguilera, Alan Cumming, Eric Dane
goldenGlobe.description: After leaving Iowa with stars in her eyes, Ali arrives at a Los Angeles burlesque lounge with dreams of taking the stage with her soaring voice.

imdb250.title: Heat
imdb250.actors: Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Val Kilmer, Jon Voight
imdb250.description: As a detective and a thief face off, they learn how much they need each other -- and that the line between cop and criminal isn't always well-defined.

imdb250.actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough

imdb250.description: While struggling to endure his tightly wound wife, an unfulfilling job and a surly teen, a man becomes obsessed with one of his daughter's friends.

imdb250.title: Batman Begins
imdb250.actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes
imdb250.description: Following the murder of his parents, Bruce Wayne trains with a shadowy organization and returns to Gotham City to fight crime under a new guise.

imdb250.title: L.A. Confidential
imdb250.actors: Kevin Spacey, Russell Crowe, Guy Pearce, James Cromwell
imdb250.description: Three wildly different cops form an uneasy alliance to ferret out police corruption in this Oscar-winning whodunit set in 1950s Los Angeles.

imdb250.title: Scarface
imdb250.actors: Al Pacino, Steven Bauer, Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
imdb250.description: Al Pacino stars as Cuban refugee Tony Montana, who becomes a Florida drug kingpin but makes the fatal mistake of getting high on his own supply.

imdb250.title: Catch Me If You Can
imdb250.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken, Martin Sheen
imdb250.description: An FBI agent makes it his mission to put cunning con man Frank Abagnale Jr. behind bars. But Frank not only eludes capture, he revels in the pursuit.

imdb250.title: V for Vendetta
imdb250.actors: Natalie Portman, Hugo Weaving, Stephen Rea, Stephen Fry
imdb250.description: A masked freedom fighter known as "V" takes up arms against a totalitarian government and finds an unlikely ally in a young woman.

imdb250.title: The Big Lebowski
imdb250.actors: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi
imdb250.description: Slacker Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski gets involved in a gargantuan mess of events when he's mistaken for another man named Lebowski.

imdb250.title: The Intouchables
imdb250.actors: François Cluzet, Omar Sy, Anne Le Ny, Audrey Fleurot
imdb250.description: In need of a caregiver, a wealthy aristocrat with quadriplegia hires the last person anyone expects: an ex-con with no experience. Based on a true story.

imdb250.title: Jaws

imdb250.description: When an insatiable great white shark terrorizes Amity Island, a police chief, an oceanographer and a grizzled shark hunter seek to destroy the beast.

imdb250.description: This Oscar-winning drama charts the life and work of famed economist John Forbes Nash Jr., a brilliant man plagued by the anguish of mental illness.

imdb250.description: Sylvester Stallone shot to fame as Rocky Balboa, an unknown fighter who's given a shot at fighting world champ Apollo Creed as a publicity stunt.

imdb250.title: Groundhog Day
imdb250.actors: Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott, Stephen Tobolowsky
imdb250.description: Sent to cover the annual ritual of groundhog Punxsutawney Phil, a self-centered TV weatherman mysteriously begins living the same day again and again.

imdb250.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
imdb250.actors: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Gilliam
imdb250.description: The Monty Python comedy clan skewers King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table as they quest far and wide for the Holy Grail.

imdb250.title: Klaus
imdb250.actors: Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones, Will Sasso
imdb250.description: A selfish postman and a reclusive toymaker form an unlikely friendship, delivering joy to a cold, dark town that desperately needs it.
